info.description: Video Game Rental API adalah sistem backend untuk platform penyewaan game fisik
info.title: Video Game Rental API

get.description: Get list of all bookings (Admin only)
Get detailed information about a specific booking (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new game category (Admin only)

get.description: Get list of all disputes (Admin only)
Get list of all game listings for approval (Admin only)

patch.description: Approve a pending game listing (Admin only)

get.description: Get list of all partner applications (Admin only)

patch.description: Approve a pending partner application (Admin only)
Reject a pending partner application (Admin only)

get.description: Get list of all payments (Admin only)
Get list of payments filtered by status (Admin only)
Get list of all users (Admin only)
Get detailed information about a specific user (Admin only)

patch.description: Ban or unban a user (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new game rental booking

get.description: Get list of current user's bookings

post.description: Create a dispute for a booking

get.description: Get payment information for a specific booking

post.description: Create a review for a completed booking

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific booking

400.description: Invalid booking ID or booking cannot be cancelled

get.description: Get list of all game categories
Get detailed information about a specific category
Get list of current user's disputes
Get list of all available games (public)
Search games by name, description, or platform
Get list of reviews for a specific game
Get detailed information about a specific game

post.description: Submit application to become a game rental partner

get.description: Get list of bookings for partner's games

patch.description: Confirm that game has been handed over to customer
Confirm that game has been returned by customer

get.description: Get list of games owned by the partner

post.description: Create a new game listing (Partner only)

get.description: Get detailed payment information
Get current user's profile information

post.description: Receive payment status updates from payment provider

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
